The [`{phillymetaldata}`](https://github.com/mattroumaya/phillymetaldata) R package lets R users download all data that was ever listed on [phillymetal.net](www.phillymetal.net).

If your R sessions aren't metal enough, look no further. ðŸ¤˜

This package uses the [supabase API](https://supabase.com/) to pull data directly from the source.
